wxl 1"813 - 2013 uehs 31 jeks isl=rdod - 2013'05'31
^rcfha n,hmsg m%isoaO lrk ,§&
II fldgi – wêlrK
msgqj
mk;a ... ... ... ... —
mk;a flgqïm;a ... ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha ±kaùï ... ... ... ... —
Y%S ,xld weme,a Widúfha ±kaùï ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha wmrdO kvq ieis ms<sn| ksfõok ... —
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK ±kaùï ... 824
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla  NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu  i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk ±kaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m< lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd
Èkhka iy fõ,djka ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m< lsÍu i|yd ish¨ u oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod
Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g wjika lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy
fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk whg m%udKj;a ld, fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d
iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla
meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq
fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m< lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m< lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr tkï" 2013 cqks ui 21 jeks Èk
m< flfrk .eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2013 cqks ui 07 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg
NdrÈh hq;= h'
mS' tÉ' t,a' ù' o is,ajd"
rcfha uqøKd,hdêm;s ^je' n'&
2013 ckjdß ui 01 jeks Èk"
fld<U 08"
rcfha uqøK fomd¾;fïka;=fõ § h'
823 - B 80733— 2,200 (2013/05)
D 1 -

jia;= Nx.;aj kvq ms<sn| ±kaùï ... ... ... —
msial,a ud¾I,ajrekaf.a m;a lsÍï ... ... ... —

Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h
fuu .eiÜ m;%h  www. documents.gov. lk fjí wvúfhka  nd.; l< yel'
ie' hq'-  (i) iqrdnÿ ^ixfYdaOk& mk;a flgqïm;" 2013 fmnrjdß ui 22 jeks Èk  Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ
m;%fha II jeks fldgfia w;sf¾lhla jYfhka m<lrk ,§'
(ii) wefgda¾ks n,m;% ^ixfYdaOk& mk;a flgqïm;" 2013 fmnrjdß ui 22 jeks Èk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ
m;%fha II jeks fldgfia w;sf¾lhla jYfhka m<lrk ,§'
(iii) fkd;dßia  ^ixfYdaOk& mk;a flgqïm;" 2013 fmnrjdß ui 22 jeks Èk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha
II jeks fldgfia w;sf¾lhla jYfhka m<lrk ,§'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2013'05'31824
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï
ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - kqjrt<sh
kqjrt<sh ufyia;%d;a wêlrKfha wjika ù we;s jir 05lg jvd merKs kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍug iQodkï fldg we;s nj oekqï fokq
,efí'
02' kvqj,g wod< hï md¾Yjlrefjl=g ;udg wjYH kvqfõ fyda kvqj, iïmQ¾K msgm;la fyda hï fldgila fyda kvqj,g
f.dkq lr we;s hï ,shú,a,la fyda wem uqo,la ,nd .ekSug wjYH kï" ta i|yd b,a,Sula 2013'08'31 Èkg fmr fuu wêlrKfha
frðiag%d¾jrhd fj; bÈßm;a l< hq;= h'
03' tfia b,a,Sula fkdjqjfyd;a my; i|yka ish¿u kvq jd¾;d 2013'08'31 jeks Èfkka miqj wêlrK N+ñfha § úkdY lrkq ,nk
nj fuhska oekqï fokq ,efí'
ta' ã' iS' tia' fyajdjiï"
ufyia;%d;a w;sf¾l Èid úksiqre"
ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh"
kqjrt<sh'
2013 uehs ui 03 jeks Èk"

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2013'05'31834
udkj ysñlï ixúOdkh ixia:d.; lsÍu i|yd jQ mk;ls
yqkhsia *drela" jk uu Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha
md¾,sfïka;=fõ wxl 48^1& ork ia:djr ksfhda.h hgf;a —udkj
ysñlï ixúOdkh ixia:d.; lsÍu i|yd jQ mk;ls˜ hkqfjka
ye¢kafjk mk;a flgqïm;la md¾,sfïka;=fõ § bÈßm;a lsÍug woyia
lrk nj fuhska oekqï foñ'
mk;a flgqïmf;a wruqKq jkqfha my; i|yka fmdÿ mrud¾:j,ska
hqla; jkakd jQ tlS wdh;kh ixia:d.; lsÍuhs (-
1' udkj whs;sjdislï" udkj Ydia;% yd uQ,sl whs;sjdislï
wdrlaId lsÍu yd oekqj;a lsÍu ; iy
2' udkj Ydia;% lghq;=" l%Svd yd iudc fiajd lghq;=
iïnkaOfhka wkq.%y oelaùu yd wkqn, §u"
hkdÈh fõ'
yqkhsia *drela"
md¾,sfïka;= uka;%S'
05-881
úúO oekaùï
.Kka fírd jid oeóu ms<sn| oekaùu
;u isú,a wêlrK n,h l%shd;aul lsÍfï § fld<U §
meje;afjk niakdysr m<d;ano uydêlrKfha § h
tys ,shdmÈxÑ ld¾hd,h kdj,msáh" fudkaáls%iafgda
tiafÜÜ ys msysá fikag%,a ys,aia ma,dkafÜIka ^m%hsjÜ&
,sñgâ .Kka fírd jidoeóu ms<sn| ldrKh
iïnkaOjhs'
iy
2007 wxl 07 ork iud.ï mkf;a XII fldgi
hgf;a iy ta m%ldrj .re wêlrKh u.ska .Kka
fírd jid oeóu i|yd jQ b,a,Sula ms<sn| ldrKh
iïnkaOjhs'
isf,daka à fn%dal¾ia mSt,aiS"
wxl 43" cdj;a; mdr"
fld<U 05'
'''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''fm;aiïlre'
isú,a wêlrK n,h l%shd;aul lsÍu iïnkaOfhka fld<U §
meje;afjkq ,nk niakdysr m<df;a uydêlrKh úiska by; ku
i|yka iud.u .Kka fírd jid oukq ,eîu i|yd fld<U 05"
cdj;a; mdr" wxl 43 ys msysá isf,daka à fn%dal¾ia mSt,aiS iud.u
úiska 2013 uehs ui 02 jeks Èk tlS wêlrKhg fm;aiula bÈßm;a
lrkq ,enQ nj;a" tlS fm;aiu 2013 cQ,s ui 25 jeks Èk wêlrKh
bÈßfha úuiSu i|yd kshu lrkq ,enQ nj;a" tlS fm;aiu iïnkaOj
ksfhda.hla lsÍu i|yd iydh §ug fyda Bg úreoaO ùug leue;a;la
olajk tlS iud.fï ljr fyda Kh ysñfhl=g fyda odhlfhl=g
